verses.verse: "Now <S%H6258><s%> muster <S%H1413><s%> yourselves in troops, <S%H1413><s%> daughter <S%H1323><s%> of troops; <S%H1416><s%> They have laid <S%H7760><s%> siege <S%H4692><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> us; With a rod <S%H7626><s%> they will smite <S%H5221><s%> the judge <S%H8199><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> on the cheek. <S%H3895><s%>

"But as for you, Bethlehem <S%H1035><s%> Ephrathah, <S%H672><s%> [Too] little <S%H6810><s%> to be among the clans <S%H505><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> From you One will go <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> for Me to be ruler <S%H4910><s%> in Israel. <S%H3478><s%> His goings <S%H4163><s%> forth <S%H4163><s%> are from long <S%H6924><s%> ago, <S%H6924><s%> From the days <S%H3117><s%> of eternity. <S%H5769><s%>"

Therefore, <S%H3651><s%> He will give <S%H5414><s%> them [up] until <S%H5704><s%> the time <S%H6256><s%> When she who is in labor <S%H3205><s%> has borne <S%H3205><s%> a child. Then the remainder <S%H3499><s%> of His brethren <S%H251><s%> Will return <S%H7725><s%> to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And He will arise <S%H5975><s%> and shepherd <S%H7462><s%> [His flock] In the strength <S%H5797><s%> of the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> In the majesty <S%H1347><s%> of the name <S%H8034><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> His God. <S%H430><s%> And they will remain, <S%H3427><s%> Because <S%H3588><s%> at that time <S%H6258><s%> He will be great <S%H1431><s%> To the ends <S%H657><s%> of the earth. <S%H776><s%>

And this <S%H2088><s%> One <S%H2088><s%> will be [our] peace. <S%H7965><s%> When <S%H3588><s%> the Assyrian <S%H804><s%> invades <S%H935><s%> our land, <S%H776><s%> When <S%H3588><s%> he tramples <S%H1869><s%> on our citadels, <S%H759><s%> Then we will raise <S%H6965><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> him Seven <S%H7651><s%> shepherds <S%H7462><s%> and eight <S%H8083><s%> leaders <S%H5257><s%> of men. <S%H120><s%>

And they will shepherd <S%H7462><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Assyria <S%H804><s%> with the sword, <S%H2719><s%> The land <S%H776><s%> of Nimrod <S%H5248><s%> at its entrances; <S%H6607><s%> And He will deliver <S%H5337><s%> [us] from the Assyrian <S%H804><s%> When <S%H3588><s%> he attacks <S%H935><s%> our land <S%H776><s%> And when <S%H3588><s%> he tramples <S%H1869><s%> our territory. <S%H1366><s%>

Then the remnant <S%H7611><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%> Will be among <S%H7130><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> peoples <S%H5971><s%> Like dew <S%H2919><s%> from the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> Like showers <S%H7241><s%> on vegetation <S%H6212><s%> Which <S%H834><s%> do not wait <S%H6960><s%> for man <S%H376><s%> Or delay <S%H3176><s%> for the sons <S%H1121><s%> of men. <S%H120><s%>

And the remnant <S%H7611><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%> Will be among the nations, <S%H1471><s%> Among <S%H7130><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> peoples <S%H5971><s%> Like a lion <S%H9030><s%> among the beasts <S%H929><s%> of the forest, <S%H9194><s%> Like a young <S%H3715><s%> lion <S%H3715><s%> among flocks <S%H5739><s%> of sheep, <S%H6629><s%> Which, <S%H834><s%> if <S%H518><s%> he passes <S%H5674><s%> through, <S%H5674><s%> Tramples <S%H7429><s%> down <S%H7429><s%> and tears, <S%H2963><s%> And there <S%H369><s%> is none <S%H369><s%> to rescue. <S%H5337><s%>

Your hand <S%H3027><s%> will be lifted <S%H7311><s%> up against <S%H5921><s%> your adversaries, <S%H6862><s%> And all <S%H3605><s%> your enemies <S%H340><s%> will be cut <S%H3772><s%> off. <S%H3772><s%>

"And it will be in that day, <S%H3117><s%>" declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> "That I will cut <S%H3772><s%> off <S%H3772><s%> your horses <S%H5483><s%> from among <S%H7130><s%> you And destroy your chariots. <S%H6><s%>
"I will also cut <S%H3772><s%> off <S%H3772><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%> of your land <S%H776><s%> And tear <S%H2040><s%> down <S%H2040><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> your fortifications. <S%H4013><s%>
"I will cut <S%H3772><s%> off <S%H3772><s%> sorceries <S%H3785><s%> from your hand, <S%H3027><s%> And you will have <S%H1961><s%> fortunetellers <S%H6049><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> more.

"I will cut <S%H3772><s%> off <S%H3772><s%> your carved <S%H6456><s%> images <S%H6456><s%> And your [sacred] pillars <S%H4676><s%> from among <S%H7130><s%> you, So that you will no <S%H3808><s%> longer <S%H5750><s%> bow <S%H7812><s%> down <S%H7812><s%> To the work <S%H4639><s%> of your hands. <S%H3027><s%>
"I will root <S%H5428><s%> out your Asherim <S%H842><s%> from among <S%H7130><s%> you And destroy <S%H8045><s%> your cities. <S%H5892><s%>
"And I will execute <S%H6213><s%> vengeance <S%H5359><s%> in anger <S%H639><s%> and wrath <S%H2534><s%> On the nations <S%H1471><s%> which <S%H834><s%> have not obeyed. <S%H8085><s%>"
